title: The Spa
overview: Hollywood. It's home to Beverly Hills...Rodeo Drive...and Sophie's, an opulent, sensual salon for discriminating women. Under Stephanie Swift's guidance, some of the most respected ladies in Beverly Hills society are treated to private consultations that bring their innermost sexual fantasies to life. But Stephanie soon learns that even life at a palace of pleasure has a dark side. Sophie's...where dreams come true for a price.
